game.name: EVE Online: Level 4 Mastery pack
game.genres: Action, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards
game.shortDescription: 오메가 시간 3개월, 1,000 PLEX, 1,250,000 스킬 포인트로 더 높이 날아오르세요. 베테랑 캡슐리어 육성에 맞춘 패키지로 신규 함선을 개방하고 빠르게 스킬을 훈련하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fuel your mastery with 3 months of Omega, 1,000 PLEX and 1,250,000 SP. Unlock new ships, train faster, and dominate with this powerful veteran-focused pack.
